Docs.summary: Extensions for IServiceCollection for startup initialization of Web APIs.

Docs.param: The to which to add this configuration.
The configuration instance.
The configuration section with the necessary settings to initialize authentication options.
The JWT bearer scheme name to be used. By default it uses "Bearer".
Set to true if you want to debug, or just understand the JWT bearer events.
Docs.summary: Protects the web API with Microsoft identity platform (formerly Azure AD v2.0). This method expects the configuration file will have a section, named "AzureAd" as default, with the necessary settings to initialize authentication options.
